scripts.start: set DEFAULTPORT=8003&& set APPLICATION=spinner&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js --env build_mode=development && electron-forge start
scripts.package: set DEFAULTPORT=8003&& set APPLICATION=spinner&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge package
scripts.make: set DEFAULTPORT=8003&& set APPLICATION=spinner&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge make
scripts.publish: set DEFAULTPORT=8003&& set APPLICATION=spinner&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge publish
